title: mirek92
author: mirek92
content: Hello, I would like to lock BSC tokens with BNB to Pancakeswap liquidity pool. But Pancakeswap does not offer to lock. Which cheap or free service could you recomend me for this purpose?Thank you

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: What token are you going to lock? Looking at the https://pancakeswap.finance/farmsThey're not requiring you to lock your fund there and that's a better option because you can pull it out anytime you wish. And the rate has increased but you need to partner it with BNB and another token like cake. If it's not allowing you to lock, just don't move it.

comments.author: mirek92
comments.body: I probably didn't express myself accurately. I meant LP for the new token, not the farm.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Quote from: mirek92 on November 04, 2022, 10:14:45 PMI probably didn't express myself accurately. I meant LP for the new token, not the farm.Just go to the pools page and you'll see those choices you may want to have ~ https://pancakeswap.finance/poolsThe average locking period for cake is around 40 weeks and they're offering higher rates as of looking at it. And that's probably because of the volatility that one may take. If it's on the LPool, you don't have to partner it with BNB, there are 9 options of tokens reward for you to choose from upon staking cake.
